Class InboxManager

  • java.lang.Object

extends AbstractManager

    • Method Detail

      • setRead

        @EndpointImplementation(value={READ_MESSAGE,UNREAD_MESSAGE})
public void setRead(boolean read,
                                                                 Message m,
                                                                 Message... more)
             throws NetworkException
        Sets the message as read or unread. This message must not be a comment (in other words, it must be a private message).
        Parameters:
        m - The message to mark as read or unread.
        more - Any additional messages
        read - Whether the message will be marked (true) or unread (false)
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful

      • setAllRead

        @EndpointImplementation(value=READ_ALL_MESSAGES)
public void setAllRead()
                throws NetworkException
        Sets all unread messages as read.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the response code was not 202

      • compose

        public void compose(java.lang.String to,
           java.lang.String subject,
           java.lang.String body)
             throws NetworkException,
                    ApiException
        Sends a private message as the currently logged in user.
        Parameters:
        to - Who to send this message to
        subject - The message's subject
        body - The message's body
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request did not complete successfully
        ApiException - If the Reddit API returned an error

      • compose

        public void compose(java.lang.String from,
           java.lang.String to,
           java.lang.String subject,
           java.lang.String body)
             throws NetworkException,
                    ApiException
        Sends a private message.
        Parameters:
        from - Who to send this message as. If sending as the currently authenticated user, leave this empty. If sending as a subreddit you moderate, use the name of the subreddit without "/r/" (for example: "pics")
        to - Who to send this message to
        subject - The message's subject
        body - The message's body
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request did not complete successfully
        ApiException - If the Reddit API returned an error

      • compose

        public void compose(java.lang.String to,
           java.lang.String subject,
           java.lang.String body,
           Captcha captcha,
           java.lang.String captchaAttempt)
             throws NetworkException,
                    ApiException
        Sends a private message as the currently logged in user with a given captcha. Only really needed if the user has less than 10 link karma.
        Parameters:
        to - Who to send this message to
        subject - The message's subject
        body - The message's body
        captcha - The Captcha the user is attempting
        captchaAttempt - The user's guess at the captcha
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request did not complete successfully
        ApiException - If the Reddit API returned an error

      • compose

        @EndpointImplementation(value=COMPOSE)
public void compose(java.lang.String from,
                                              java.lang.String to,
                                              java.lang.String subject,
                                              java.lang.String body,
                                              Captcha captcha,
                                              java.lang.String captchaAttempt)
             throws NetworkException,
                    ApiException
        Sends a private message.
        Parameters:
        from - Who to send this message as. If sending as the currently authenticated user, leave this empty. If sending as a subreddit you moderate, use the name of the subreddit without "/r/" (for example: "pics")
        to - Who to send this message to
        subject - The message's subject
        body - The message's body
        captcha - The Captcha the user is attempting
        captchaAttempt - The user's guess at the captcha
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request did not complete successfully
        ApiException - If the Reddit API returned an error
